TextLibrary.Text: General, we have information about the Soulless.
General, we have information about the Soulless.
Your timing is impeccable. Speak. This channel is secure. After that I have a message for you.
Your timing is impeccable. Speak. This channel is secure. After that I have a message for you.

They're out here on the rim as you suspected. We have a means of locating them. They are being lead by some creature called Gamma Prime - he is an advanced version of the Soulless, integrated with the ship.

They're out here on the rim as you suspected. We have a means of locating them. They are being lead by some creature called Gamma Prime - he is an advanced version of the Soulless, integrated with the ship.
Excellent work! Continue your search. Find the ship. We'll protect your back, but be warned, two MRI Mindships slipped through. They'll be looking for you.
Excellent work! Continue your search. Find the ship. We'll protect your back, but be warned, two MRI Mindships slipped through. They'll be looking for you.
I'll take care of the MRI Ships, General. We'll ambush them in the Acheron System. Talk to you soon.
I'll take care of the MRI Ships, General. We'll ambush them in the Acheron System. Talk to you soon.
